official_title: To restore duty-free treatment to certain motor vehicle parts entered under the Automotive Products Trade Act.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to restore duty-free treatment of certain motor vehicle parts entered under the Automotive Products Trade Act.
